import React from "react"; import { useDisclosure } from "@mantine/hooks"; import { AppShell, Burger, Group, Center, Image, Text } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconAlignJustified, IconCircleXFilled } from "@tabler/icons-react"; import Demo from "./Demo"; import { IconHomeCog, IconAppsFilled, IconDeviceDesktopAnalytics, IconUser, IconGardenCart, IconClipboardText, IconSettings, IconLogout, IconSwitchHorizontal, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const AppShellDemo = () => { const [opened, { toggle }] = useDisclosure(); return (
Theme-1
); }; export default AppShellDemo;
